		Question: who was stephen r covey
		Answer:
answer: Stephen R. Covey was an American author, educator, and businessman. He was best known for his book The 7 Habits of Highly Effective People, which has sold over 40 million copies worldwide. Covey also wrote several other books on leadership, personal development, and family relationships. He was a co-founder of the FranklinCovey Company, a leadership training and consulting firm. Covey died in 2012 at the age of 79.
